CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1962, pg. 9 reads: " Presenting Charter - One of the highlights of the "Cotton Extravaganza" given by the Squaws Club, last Tuesday night at the Hilton Hotel, was the presentation of the club's charter. Dr. H.D. Primas is seen presenting the charter to Mrs. Ethel Chavis, president of the Squaws."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twenty women wearing light colored cocktail dresses, posed in front of stage in Hilton Hotel for Squaw Club's "Cotton Extravaganza"
